description: AI Driven tools for researches and students. Use AI to summarize and understand scientific articles and research papers.
title: Use AI To Summarize Scientific Articles - SciSummary
introduction: SciSummary is a tool designed for summarizing scientific articles and research papers quickly and efficiently. It utilizes advanced AI models like GPT-3.5 and GPT-4 to provide concise summaries for busy scientists, students, and enthusiasts who want to stay updated on the latest research findings without spending hours reading lengthy articles.
features: Send documents via email or upload to dashboard for summary
Powered by advanced AI models like GPT-3.5 and GPT-4
Learn and improve through analysis by a team of PhDs
pricing: Free trial for the first 7 days with specific limits on word count and features. Paid plan includes 1,000,000 words summarized per month with additional features like bulk summaries and chat messages.

faqs.question: What AI models does SciSummary use?
faqs.answer: SciSummary uses GPT-3.5 and GPT-4 models for summarizing scientific articles.

faqs.question: Is there a free trial available?
faqs.answer: Yes, there is a free trial for the first 7 days with specific limits on word count and features.

faqs.question: What is included in the paid plan?
faqs.answer: The paid plan includes 1,000,000 words summarized per month, unlimited bulk summaries, 10,000 chat messages per month, and more features.
